’value/text’ = Limits the search to all subjects of a specific type(can use subject type, name or specific ID).
* NOT WORKING* ’value,value’ = Limits subjects to a list of item specific IDs.
* NOT WORKING* ’text,text’ = Limits subjects to a list of item specific names.
’text’ = Displays a list of subjects containing a specific text string.
’value’ = The item specific ID to start the list with.
'value' = The total number of results to retrieve.
'text' = Sort the displayed results by a specific identifier such as subject_type, subject_name, etc.
'ASC/DESC' = Sort the displayed results in ascending or descending order.
'text' #commadelimited list of User Defined fields to retrieve for subjects

body.raw:
{
  "username": "{{username}}",
  "auth_token":"{{auth_token}}",
  "method":"import_subjects",
  "subject_type":"Plate",
  "json": [
  	{
     	"Name": "NJB_TEST_1",
     	"BARCODE": "NJB_TEST_1",
    	"Plate Type": "Viral Prep Plate",
  		"PCT Positions Used": "A01",
  		"NTC Positions Used": "B01",
  		"NEC Positions Used": "C01"
    }]
}

urlencoded.description: 'all/today/yesterday/week/month’ = Displays audit records made today, yesterday, this week, or this month.
’date_from,date_to’ = Displays audit records made within a specific date range(format: mm/dd/yyyy).
’value,value’ = Displays audits records of a specific range of subjects.
’value’ = The item specific ID to start the list with.
'value' = The total number of items to retrieve.
'text' = Sort the displayed results by a specific field such as subject_type, subject_name, etc.
'ASC/DESC' = Sort the displayed results in ascending or descending order.
